channel.title: Android on Exploring CS
channel.description: Recent content in Android on Exploring CS

item.title: Job-Comparator: An Android Application
item.description: Introduction Job Comparison App is an Android mobile app which allows a user to compare job offers using customizable settings. System requirements Job Comparison App requires Android version 10 (Android Q) and Pixel 4 XL. Features and functionalities Main menu When the app starts, a main menu is displayed and it allows the user to choose one of the four options: Enter or edit current job details Enter job offers Adjust the comparison settings Compare job offers (enabled if there are 2 or more jobs).
